subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Tyrone Carter replaced Steelers' safety Ryan Clark as a medical precaution and returned the first of two interceptions 48 yards for a touchdown in Pittsburgh's Monday night win over Denver.
snippet: Tyrone Carter replaced Steelers' safety Ryan Clark as a medical precaution and returned the first of two interceptions 48 yards for a touchdown in Pittsburgh's Monday night win over Denver.
